casebody.data:
McCrary et al. v. Glover, guardian. This being the first grant of a new trial, and no abuse of discretion' being clearly apparent, the judgment is April 17, 1893.

Argued at the last term.

Ejectment. Before Judge Roberts. Twiggs superior court. April term, 1892. Steed & Wimberly and L. D. Moore, for plaintiffs. E Chambers and L. D. Shannon, for defendant.

Affirmed.
